channel.title: Need help with using objects on items ex:chisel on ruby ect
channel.description: Ok its been a while since i was last coding my server then i deleted it. But anyways in my old server i had alot of using chisels on different gems and stuff, simple things like that. Say you'd use a chisel on a sapphire it would cut the sapphire have the animation and make it into (replaceitem) with a ammulet of magic. Same goes for using a tinderbox on logs and it would make a fire. I totally forgot how to do this so can anyone please help me and make a code? Any help would be appreciated thanks!

item.title: Need help with using objects on items ex:chisel on ruby ect
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

if ((itemUsed == ###1) && (useWith == ###2) || (itemUsed == ###1) && (useWith == ###2)) { if (playerLevel[20] >= 1) { deleteItem(###1, getItemSlot(###1), 1); deleteItem(###2, getItemSlot(###2), 1); addItem(###3, 1); addSkillXP(###4, 20); setAnimation(###5); } else { sM("You need a higher crafting level to make this."); } }

#1- first item used/deleted
#2- second item used/deleted
#3- item you get after combination
#4- xp amount that you get after combining(20 - crafting)
#5- animation

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with using objects on items ex:chisel on ruby ect
